thread.title: BRIEF-Avanquest FY net loss group share before IFRS narrows to 6.5 mln euros
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Avanquest FY net loss group share before IFRS narrows to 6.5 mln euros | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-Avanquest FY net loss group share before IFRS narrows to 6.5 mln euros
text:
Oct 14 Avanquest SA :
* FY current operating loss before IFRS of 10.3 million euros ($11.8 million) versus loss of 4.6 million euros a year ago
* FY net loss group share before IFRS of 6.5 million euros versus loss of 42.2 million euros a year ago Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: ($1 = 0.8737 euros) (Gdynia Newsroom)
